name: Project Xarpax
description:
Early version of Project Xarpax - v0.9

The game modeled on retro fps, has fast gameplay with open worlds.

- 4 weapons
- a lot of finds
- dynamic control
- 7 different maps

Game good for speedrun

MINIMAL SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

  • Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 2.4 GHz / AMD Phenom 9850 2.5 GHz.
  • 4GB pamięci operacyjnej.
  • Intel HD Graphics
  • 500MB  free hard disk space.
  • DirectX 10 compatible sound card.
  • Windows Vista / 7 SP1 / 8 / 8.1/10  64-Bit
